formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Verbose' =-
[Synopsis] Send arbitrary text to verbose output
[Description] Verbose([<level>|]<message>) level must be an integer value. If not specified, defaults to 0.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ Send arbitrary text to verbose output
[Description] - Verbose([<level>|]<message>) + Verbose([<level>,]<message>) level must be an integer value. If not specified, defaults to 0.
